subject: Homosexuality
Basketball
Uniforms
lead_paragraph: On Monday, inquiries by those eager to buy a Nets jersey with Jason Collins’s name started to multiply. On Tuesday, Collins jerseys will go on sale at the N.B.A.’s retail shop in Manhattan and online.
